CustomField.formula: IF(NokiaCPQ_Configuration_Type__c <> 'Bundle', IF((ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Config2__ChargeType__c,'Year 1 Maintenance') || ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Config2__ChargeType__c,'Maintenance for Y2 & Beyond')) && ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Config2__LineType__c, 'Option'), Apttus_Config2__NetUnitPrice__c , Apttus_Config2__BasePrice__c), null)
CustomField.label: IRP
